attributes.action: Stop genocide, militarisation of Indian occupied Kashmir & revoking article 370
attributes.additional_details:
Indian forces using force to silence Kashmir freedom movement for past 7 decades.
Indian forces use pellet guns to blind peaceful freedom protesters and burned houses of political activists.
India has revoked arty 370 to dilute Muslim majority of Kashmir by allowing Hindu settlers from India
There has been recent rise in anti minorities clashes and Hindu extremist Lynch mobs since the re-election Modi regime which was also responsible for Muslim genocide in Gujarat
attributes.background:
India is flooding Kashmir with troops to oppress Muslim majority and further dilution of majority by revoking art. 370.world should stop this genocide in the name of security by extremist oppressive Indian regime. 
Kashmir should be given their right of self determination as per UN resolutions.
